title: Property for sale in Battaramulla subuthipura
details:
Property for sale in the heart of battaramulla

Close vicinity to waters edge hotel, walking distance to passport office and government ministries.

Ideal location to put up an apartment complex or a housing project etc.

30 perch block , 3.5 million per perch ( Negotiable )

Contact us for more details and inspections can be arranged only on prior appointments
